mapper.insert: insert into review_tb(rating, comment, space_id, user_id, created_at) values (#{rating}, #{comment}, #{spaceId}, #{userId}, now())
mapper.select: select r.id, r.rating, r.comment, r.space_id, r.user_id, u.username, u.nickname, u.user_division, s.space_name, r.created_at as review_created_at from review_tb r left join user_tb u on u.id = r.user_id left join space_tb s on s.id = r.space_id left join user_tb su on s.user_id = su.id where u.id = #{id} or su.id = #{id} order by r.id desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from review_tb r left join user_tb u on u.id = r.user_id left join space_tb s on s.id = r.space_id left join user_tb su on s.user_id = su.id where u.id = #{id} or su.id = #{id}
select count(comment) , space_id from review_tb where space_id = #{spaceId};
